title: John Green (author)
summary: John Green (born August 24, 1977) is an American author, YouTube content creator, and podcaster. He won the 2006 Printz Award for his debut novel, Looking for Alaska,[2] and has had several of his subsequent books debut at number one on The New York Times Best Seller list, including his most popular novel, The Fault in Our Stars.[3] The 2014 film adaptation of The Fault in Our Stars opened at number one at the box office and was a commercial and critical success.[4] In 2014, Green was included in Time magazine's list of The 100 Most Influential People in the World.[5] Another film based on a Green novel, Paper Towns, was released on July 24, 2015.
